name: Super Red Ball Hopper Hop
description:
Roll the Red ball as far as you can. Jump over the unpredictable movement of blocks.
It’s highly addictive that will test your reaction and reflexes
It’s not easy to play on.

 How far can you make reach?
• Tap to jump
• Jump over the spikes

Hope you would enjoy playing. If you do, please don’t forget to rate the game
